tool.name: NSSlopePiles
tool.displayname: Derive North-South Plane of Array Slope from Piles

param.name: pilesInput
param.dialogReference: Point layer that defines the piles in each row with a unique row ID for each row

param.name: row_ID
param.dialogReference: Field in the pile input feature class that provides a unique value (string or integer) for each row.

param.name: poaField
param.dialogReference: Field in the pile feature class that designates the top of pile elevation

param.name: slopeUnits
param.dialogReference: Defines the units of the slope output: percent or degrees. Positive values: north Negative values: south

tool.summary:
Derives the north-south plane of array slope from the piles with a top of pile/plane of array field.

  • This tool modifies the input feature class adding a field that shows the plane of array slope for each pile. Piles that are in the same row will have the same values.

  • This tool is most useful to check designed planes of array.

idCitation.resTitle: Derive North-South Plane of Array Slope from Piles
